Class MeterService

java.lang.Object
com.kf7014.citizenmicroservice.service.MeterService
@Service public class MeterService extends Object
Service class responsible for managing meter operations.

This service handles the generation of automatic and manual meter readings, initializes meters with the latest readings from the provider, and communicates with the provider's API to send and receive meter data.

Scheduling annotations are used to periodically generate and send readings.

Since:
2024-11-27
Version:
1.0
Author:
Muhammad Naqvi

  • Constructor Details

    • MeterService

      public MeterService(List<Meter> smartMeters, List<Meter> citizenMeters, ProviderProperties providerProperties, org.springframework.web.reactive.function.client.WebClient webClient)
      Constructs a new MeterService with the specified dependencies.
      Parameters:
      smartMeters - The list of smart meters managed by the service.
      citizenMeters - The list of citizen meters managed by the service.
      providerProperties - Configuration properties for the provider service.
      webClient - The WebClient used for external API communication.

  • Method Details

    • initializeLastReadings

      public void initializeLastReadings(List<Meter> meters)
      Initializes the last readings for a list of meters by fetching the latest readings from the provider.
      Parameters:
      meters - The list of Meter instances to initialize.

    • generateAndSendAutomaticReadings

      @Scheduled(fixedRate=60000L) public void generateAndSendAutomaticReadings()
      Generates and sends automatic readings for all smart meters at a fixed rate.

      This method is scheduled to run every 60 seconds. It generates a new reading for each smart meter and sends the data to the provider's API.

    • simulateCitizenManualReadings

      @Scheduled(fixedRate=120000L) public void simulateCitizenManualReadings()
      Simulates manual readings submitted by citizens at a fixed rate.

      This method is scheduled to run every 2 minutes. It simulates a random number of citizens submitting readings for their meters and sends the data to the provider's API.

    • submitManualReading

      public void submitManualReading(String meterId, double reading)
      Submits a manual reading for a specific meter to the provider's API.
      Parameters:
      meterId - The unique identifier of the meter.
      reading - The reading value to submit.
